job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: We're looking for aspiring and talented developers who want to join our team. We will give you the tools and knowledge to build amazing products and lift your career to new heights.If you think about coding as craftsmanship, have an academic or similar background in software engineering, and want to learn how to build incredible software in record speeds, you've come to the right place.Requirements2-4 years working as a developerBSc Computer Science, Mathematics, or any related degree/relevant experienceAll around player, fast, self-learning individualExperience working in a Linux environmentPassion for code craftsmanshipSmart, problem solverLoves getting shit done!Experience developing customer facing/web/app products a plusExperience in server side Javascript, Python or Ruby a plus
